text: Alberto Colombo (23 February 1946 â€“ 7 January 2024) was an Italian racing driver. He entered three Formula One Grands Prix in 1978 with ATS (two failures to qualify) and Merzario (one failure to pre-qualify). He won the 1974 Italian Formula Three Championship and was successful in Formula Two. Colombo was born in Varedo, Lombardy, Italy. Colombo died on 7 January 2024, at the age of 77.Addio ad Alberto Colombo, il cappellone che ha sognato i GP ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian racecar drivers Category:Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Alberto Colombo (racing driver)
